DOC.brief_summary: Internal biliary drainage use stent use malignant hilar obstruction cholangiocarcinoma , hepatocellular carcinoma malignancy include metastasis . Bilateral drainage physiologic long patency unilateral drainage . There two method bilateral drainage : Y-stent side side . However clinical data compare effectiveness two method . DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Two Methods Bilateral Stenting Malignant Hilar Obstruction
